subject: svn commit: samba-docs r1115 - in trunk/smbdotconf/winbind: .
body:
Author: vlendec
Date: 2007-05-16 17:47:29 +0000 (Wed, 16 May 2007)
New Revision: 1115

WebSVN: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba-docs&rev=1115

Log:
Fix a quite significant typo found by Bj?\195?\182rn Jacke .

Jerry/Simo, please check!

Modified:
   trunk/smbdotconf/winbind/winbindtrusteddomainsonly.xml


Changeset:
Modified: trunk/smbdotconf/winbind/winbindtrusteddomainsonly.xml
===================================================================
--- trunk/smbdotconf/winbind/winbindtrusteddomainsonly.xml	2007-05-15 04:02:34 UTC (rev 1114)
+++ trunk/smbdotconf/winbind/winbindtrusteddomainsonly.xml	2007-05-16 17:47:29 UTC (rev 1115)
@@ -13,7 +13,7 @@
 	

-	This parameter is not deprecated in favor of the newer idmap_nss backend.
+	This parameter is now deprecated in favor of the newer idmap_nss backend.
 	Refer to the  smb.conf option and
 	the idmap_nss
8 man page for more information.
